incomplete_edges.description: Delete a certain edge from the graph to simulate missing relations caused by data incompleteness source or data collection errors.

false_edges.description: A false edge is an edge that does not exist in the original graph but is added to the graph to simulate incorrect relations extracted from noisy sources.

relation_type_noise.description: Replace or add the relation type or display_relation with another valid relation of the same semantic family to simulate extraction misclassification.

node_type_noise.description: For a ceratin node, replace its node type with another valid node type to simulate entity classification errors.

name_typos.description: Inject character-level noise into the name of a node to mimic OCR errors, NLP extraction mistakes, or synonym ambiguity.

attribute_noise.description: Inject noise into the attribute values of a node to simulate attribute value extraction errors.
